alert.note: Alert for Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 9:30PM EDT until July 20 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water affects the lowest portions of River Bend Road and River Birch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.9 feet Wednesday evening. - Advisory stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Northeast Cape Fear River Burgaw 10.0 8.1 Fri 8 pm EDT 7.7 7.4 7.2 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Saturday morning.
